Activity: Log in, check emails and messages. Skim industry news on EHR validation best practices.
Review the week's goals and prioritize tasks: Data element cross-validation, automated rule implementation, and data audits.
Begin cross-validating patient demographic data (name, DOB, address) against scanned medical records. Focus on the last 50 records entered this month.
Document any discrepancies found during data validation. Note the type of error (e.g., transposed numbers, incorrect spelling) and the frequency.
Continue cross-validating patient demographic data against scanned medical records. Review another 50 records.
@ehrdev-1, @da-1, Schedule a brief meeting to discuss potential data validation rules for demographics. Send out the email asking for the meeting.
Research potential automated validation rules for EHR system – acceptable ranges, required fields, and format validation. Spend some time reading articles about it.
Document research findings and draft a proposal for implementing the automated validation rules. Save it as a document.
Check any updates from the colleagues, and prepare the to-do list for tomorrow.
